## Wide to long and long to wide
```{python}
import pandas as pd
```

```{python}
# Population data from GapMinder
population = pd.read_csv("~/Desktop/GSB 544/Notes/Data/pop.csv", sep=',')
population
```

WIDE TO LONG:
```{python}
long_population = population.melt(id_vars=["country"], var_name="year", value_name="population")
#var_name is the name of the new column that will contain the variables that you are moving 
#value_name is the name of the columns that will contain the values from before 
long_population
```

```{python}
wide_population = long_population.pivot(index = "country", columns = "year", values = "population")
wide_population = wide_population.reset_index()
wide_population
```
